about_the_game:
In the game "Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Return of the Heart," players will follow Liu Bei's legendary journey, dedicated to reviving the Han dynasty and creating an era of peace. The game starts with the Yellow Turban Rebellion and covers many classic historical events, such as the coalition against Dong Zhuo, the Battle of Guandu, the visit to Zhuge Liang, and the Battle of Red Cliffs, showcasing Liu Bei's collaboration with various strategists and warriors. Players not only participate in these historical events but also feel Liu Bei's commitment to the well-being of the people, experiencing the emotions and dreams of the Three Kingdoms era. This blend of history and role-playing allows players to pursue their ideals while deeply understanding the hardships and glory of that turbulent time.

This demo will include the content of the first chapter of the game, aimed at testing the usability and smoothness of various systems and the storyline. We hope everyone can provide valuable feedback.
